class.name: boris_controllers/CartesianImpedanceBorisController
class.description: The CartesianImpedanceBorisController tracks effort commands (as in JointImpedanceController from KUKA_LWR/LWR_CONTROLLERS). It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: boris_controllers/BorisBridgeController
class.description: The BorisBridgeController gets input on a ROS topic and uses the received torques as commands to the robot. The robot dynamics is compensated internally by the KUKA KCL software.
